keywords: isolated dc/dc, isolated dcdc, isolated dc-to-dc, isolated dc/dc converter, isolated dcdc converter, isolated dc-to-dc converter, high voltage, high voltage dc, hv, hvdc, high efficiency, can, ul, ce, high power, certified, 24V, 100V, 200V, 300V, 400V, 500V, 600V, 700V, 800V, 900V, 1000V, 1kV, uni-directional, unidirectional, SiC, Silicon Carbide

card.name: Uni-directional Isolated DC/DC converter
card.alt: Resonant LLC DC/DC converter sub assembly
card.description: Optimized to be the last power conversion stage for battery charging, it includes galvanic isolation, insulation fault measurement and fast output discharge circuit. With a maximum efficiency of 98%.

header.title: Uni-directional Isolated DC/DC converter
header.name: ADM-PC-LL25
header.alt: Resonant LLC DC/DC converter sub assembly
header.description: Galvanic isolation without the noise and fragility of a large transformer. The ADM-PC-LL25 Uni-direction Isolated DC/DC Converter  delivers up to 25kW at 98% efficiency, and only allowing one-way current flow.

variantClarification.VA02: Compatible with US and EU mains. Intended for 400 V<sub>DC</sub> nominal applications
variantClarification.VA04: EU mains only. Intended for 400 V<sub>DC</sub> nominal applications

hardwareDescription: If you need to charge a battery from the grid, this module will have you covered. The module is an isolated resonant DC/DC converter with silicon carbide technology, reaching up to 98% efficiency, and able to do up to 30 KW of power at an output voltage of 200 to 450V, or a maximum of 70A.
If the application demands it, modules can be put in series to reach a voltage range of 200 to 920V, and also in parallel to increase total output current. Even a mix of series+parallel is possible.
The module also includes a fast output discharge circuit, a ground isolation measurement system, and fast overvoltage/overcurrent/overtempearture protection.
When used with a ADM-PC-BP25 as an AC/DC active front end, the efficieny of the system is improved, as they will work in tandem and performing calculations to work in an optimum point
